ItemTooltips.blink: Allows you to chase and kill very well.
ItemTooltips.boots: Every hero needs boots to run fast.
ItemTooltips.flask: HP regen for when you are low.
ItemTooltips.bottle: Allows you to control runes and regen more.
ItemTooltips.tango: HP regen for when you get harassed.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Allows you to TP anywhere you want whenever you want.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Allows you to keep an enemy disabled. Also gives good stats.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Good disable if you are low on money.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Gives you good positioning. Also gives good stats.
ItemTooltips.dagon: Gives good stats and lots of damage.
ItemTooltips.ethereal_blade: Allows you to kill solo heroes very fast.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Gives lots of Mana when used with Rearm.

AbilityTooltips.tinker_heat_seeking_missile: Long range nuke helps harass and kill far off enemies.
AbilityTooltips.tinker_march_of_the_machines: Powerful aoe damage, good in team fights and for pushing.
AbilityTooltips.tinker_rearm: Allows you to TP and push lanes as well as gank anywhere once you have Boots of Travel.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Take these when you have no other choice.
